Cricket: Hawke’s Bay cricket’s big revenge in Rangiorahttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cricket-hawkes-bay-crickets-big-revenge-in-rangiora/FYH4G4TDXZGNJIYTOVNNVLM3CE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cricket-hawkes-bay-crickets-big-revenge-in-rangiora/FYH4G4TDXZGNJIYTOVNNVLM3CE/ Doug LaingThe Hawke's Bay men's cricket team needed to do something. It did. Sun, 12 Nov 2023 01:56:32 +0000 The Hawke's Bay men's cricket team on Sunday after securing the Hawke Cup in Rangiora with a first-innings win by 224 runs in a three-day challenge against Canterbury Country. Photo / HB Cricket

Dad Darcy Wilson and his son Kingston Wilson, 3, from Maungatapere, happily pose in front of a fire truck. Photo / Michael Cunningham
The Great New Zealand Road Trip: That’s a wrap - NZ’s mood and the path ahead https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-great-new-zealand-road-trip-thats-a-wrap-nzs-mood-and-the-path-ahead/B2NW4H4Q7VGT7DNW4LQBU4Z6PY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-great-new-zealand-road-trip-thats-a-wrap-nzs-mood-and-the-path-ahead/B2NW4H4Q7VGT7DNW4LQBU4Z6PY/ Shayne CurrieThe end of the roadie: NZ's best pie, pub, region, city, town, and village. A and P Show: Tie-breaker needed in rare shearing dead-heat https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/a-and-p-show-tie-breaker-needed-in-rare-shearing-dead-heat/LMFYVVXHBZD2FJJ7ALKWYL46LY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/a-and-p-show-tie-breaker-needed-in-rare-shearing-dead-heat/LMFYVVXHBZD2FJJ7ALKWYL46LY/ Doug LaingHow it was sorted out when two shearers got the same points at CHB show. Sun, 12 Nov 2023 01:08:06 +0000 The historic Open shearing final lineup at the Hawke’s Bay A and P Show on Saturday - where quality points were used as a tie-breaker in a dead-heat on overall points. From left sponsor and Hawke’s Bay farmer Hamish De Lautour, of Primary Wool Co-op, and shearers John Kirkpatrick, David Gordon (the ultimate winner), Jack Fagan and Brook Hamerton. Photo / Shedtalk

Whangārei’s Northland Events Centre judged best venue in the country https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangareis-northland-events-centre-judged-best-venue-in-the-country/YGXIGASP4FERFGKITOTYD33NGM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangareis-northland-events-centre-judged-best-venue-in-the-country/YGXIGASP4FERFGKITOTYD33NGM/ Mike DinsdaleWhere's the best events venue in the country? Right here in Northland! Sat, 11 Nov 2023 23:38:53 +0000 Whangārei’s Northland Events Centre/Semenoff Stadium - which has hosted many events, including the Women’s Rugby World Cup - has been named the best venue in the country at the New Zealand Events Association’s annual Event Awards.
